text: Aleksandr Anatolyevich Vlasov (; born 23 April 1996 in Vyborg) is a Russian cyclist, who currently rides for UCI WorldTeam . In October 2020, he was named in the startlists for the 2020 Giro d'Italia and the 2020 Vuelta a España. ==Major results== ;2014 : 1st 20px Overall GP Général Patton ::1st Stage 2 ;2015 : 3rd Coppa della Pace ;2016 : 6th GP Capodarco : 9th Giro del Medio Brenta ;2017 : 4th Gran Premio Sportivi di Poggiana : 9th Overall Giro della Valle d'Aosta : 9th Piccolo Giro di Lombardia : 9th Trofeo Città di San Vendemiano ;2018 : 1st 20px Overall Giro Ciclistico d'Italia : 2nd Overall Toscana-Terra di Ciclismo ::1st 20px Mountains classification ::1st Stage 2 : 3rd Overall Sibiu Cycling Tour : 4th Overall Tour de l'Avenir : 6th Giro del Belvedere ;2019 : 1st 20px Road race, National Road Championships : 2nd Overall Tour of Almaty : 3rd Overall Tour of Slovenia ::1st 20px Mountains classification : 3rd Overall Vuelta a Asturias : 4th Overall Giro di Sicilia : 5th Overall Tour of Austria ::1st Stage 6 : 8th Overall Vuelta a Andalucía : 8th Overall Settimana Internazionale di Coppi e Bartali : 9th Coppa Agostoni : 10th Overall Tour of the Alps ;2020 : 1st Giro dell'Emilia : 1st Mont Ventoux Dénivelé Challenge : 2nd Overall Tour de la Provence ::1st 20px Young rider classification ::1st Stage 2 : 3rd Giro di Lombardia : 3rd Overall Route d'Occitanie : 4th Gran Piemonte : 5th Overall Tirreno–Adriatico ::1st 20px Young rider classification ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! title: Aleksandr Vlasov (cyclist)
